text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to recommend LinkedIn phrasing like \"the matter has been resolved to my satisfaction.\" The candidate answer advises taking the money and suggests negotiating a 'neutral statement from them (not a retraction, but a \"mutual resolution\" or \"parties have resolved their differences\" statement),' but it never explicitly suggests or provides the specific phrasing required by the criterion (\"the matter has been resolved to my satisfaction\").", "criterion_id": "9961a046-08fe-4a4e-9d75-0110360559d1"}
